Kroniki zbrodni
Место преступления
사건의 재구성
boardgame.description: Chronicles of Crime is a cooperative game of crime investigation, mixing an app, a board game and a touch of Virtual Reality._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;With the same physical components (board, locations, characters and items), players will be able to play plenty of different scenarios and solve as many different crime stories._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players start the app, choose the scenario they want to play, and follow the story. The goal being to catch the killer of the current case in the shortest short time possible._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Using the Scan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;Play technology, each component (locations, characters, items, etc.) has a unique QR code, which, depending on the scenario selected, will activate and trigger different clues and stories. That means players will be able to get new stories way after the game is released simply by downloading the app's updates, without any shipping of new physical components involved._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The VR experience only requires a mobile phone. Players simply put the VR glasses (optional buy) onto their mobile device, and put the VR glasses on their nose, holding their mobile device in front of their eyes, to immerse themselves in the game's universe and search for clues in a virtual world._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game comes with 1 tutorial and 5 scenarios, but more can be downloaded directly inside the app!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each session last around 1h to 1h30 minutes and many scenarios are connected to each others in order to tell a much bigger story._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;description from the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;(Espa_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ntilde;ol)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Londres, en la actualidad. Acabas de dejar la oficina del Jefe de Polic_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;a. Un cuerpo ha sido hallado en Hyde Park, y tu jefe te acaba de asignar el caso. No es tu primera investigaci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n, pero algo te dice que este caso no es como los dem_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;s. Centras tu cabeza, inicias la maquinaria y te diriges a la escena del crimen. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iexcl;Es hora de trabajar!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Cr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;nicas del Crimen es un juego cooperativo de investigaci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n criminal. El uso de la tecnolog_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;a Escanea _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Juega mezcla los juegos digitales con los de tablero, permitiendo multitud de historias sobre investigaci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n criminal utilizando los mismos componentes. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iexcl;Interroga a los sospechosos, recoge pruebas, y arresta al asesino antes de que sea demasiado tarde!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Currenty available and ready for shipping. No pre-order. I will ship from Czech Republic and I am willing to ship anywhere. You can pay me through Paypal or bank transfer to my Czech bank account but any fees charged must be covered by you.
